name: Challenge #3: Blocked paths
description: In this challenge you must take the single Vehicle from City “A” to City “D”. This is different from the last challenge because now some roads are only one way. Pay attention to that!
helpText: In this challenge your task is to move the single <c>Vehicle</c> from <c>City</c> "A" to <c>City</c> "D";
<c>Road</c>s now may be one way! You can check this by looking at the arrows in each <c>Road</c>.
To move a <c>Vehicle</c> use the method <m c="Vehicle">moveTo</m>. This method also accepts arrays of IDs or <c>City</c> instances.

victory.text: Deliver the single car from City "A" to City "D"
victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return vehicles[0].lastCity.id == 'D'; }

defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 15; }
